zone.line: Darkening the night & outspeeding the wind
A Voice
Which way comest thou?
A Voice
Over Ilsenstein
The owl was awake in the white moonshine
I saw her at rest in her downy nest
And she stared at me with her broad bright eyne.
Voices
on to Hell
And you may now as well, take your course
Since you ride by so fast, on the headlong
blast
A Voice
She dropt poison upon me as I past
Here are the wounds —
Chorus of Witches.
Come away, come along
The way is wide, & the way is long
But what is that for a Bedlam throng?
Stick with the prong & scratch with the
broom
The child in the cradle lies strangled at home
And the mother is clapping her hands -
